name: Pawer Dash
description:
Dash through your opponent's attack to gather energy, than dash through its core to transfer it back to it, and make it overload! Beware though, the more energy it gets, the more dangerous it becomes...

Controls

Keyboard

WASD / ZQSD / Arrows: move

Space: jump

Shift: dash

Controller

Left joystick: move

A (Xbox) / Cross (DualShock): jump

X (XBox) / B (XBox) / Square (DualShock) /  Circle (DualShock): dash

Credits

  • Design, code and art: Sébastien "Gatlink" Gatty
  • Font: Palamecia Titling by Typodermic Fonts
  • Color palette: Tofu 20K by Tofu
  • Music: Orange Juice by TAG
  • Sounds:
    • Smash
    • Laser charge
    • Bullets
    • Dash
